fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Protect a player, granting them powerful defense for the night.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you successfully protect against an attack, the attacker will be Striked.
- You may target yourself and other Thundercry members.
- If one or more Striked players are alive, all Thundercry members are detection immune
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
